name: motif 2.5.0

screenshots.caption: no grid, mv desk or win: desk visible on monitor is in dotted line

short_description:
Motif , motif 2.0-2.2

Panner support is back and optional !

GNU/configure now builds easy

Imake is back too, Everything builds Quality Assurance Tests QUATS

Panner is NON-VIRTUAL and has new features from 2.1  (mwm deleted virtual panner in motif 2.1+).  A panner slides the visible desktop to make it a vitrually huge desktop.

NEW: pan with keys (without a panner)
NEW: panner can drag windows
NEW: edge panning

(panner can see desktops on remote computers, Motif can show/use screens from many computers or run on same screen)

audience:

* wants a simple clean desktop with benefits of an industry leader - Motif

* need Motif libs, ie ddd the wonderful GDB front-end depends libXm.so.2.0 (-2.2)

* wants makefiles that work in yr 2010+

note: does not come with CDE desktop (download on SF).  should work with but not tried.

OpenMotif / Open Group and License:

http://www.opengroup.org/openmotif
